import { useState } from "react"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; export default function Checkout() { const cartState = useSelector((state) => state.cartReducer); const cartItems = cartState.cartItems; const subTotal = cartItems.reduce((x, item) => x + item.totalPrice, 0); const [successMessage, setSuccessMessage] = useState(""); const [paymentOption, setPaymentOption] = useState(""); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const handlePaymentOptionChange = (event) => { setPaymentOption(event.target.value); }; const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); if (paymentOption === "bkash") { //window.location.href = "/bkash"; } else if (paymentOption === "cod") { setSuccessMessage("Your pizza will be delivered soon!"); } event.target.reset(); }; const handlePay = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); setSuccessMessage("Payment successful!"); }; return ( <>
